product_name: SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 GPS Bike Computer Set - Wireless
long_description: A cycling GPS you can use to navigate and track your route, the SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 wireless GPS bike computer set also measures your speed, heart rate and cadence to enhance training. GPS displays time and distance to destinations and sounds an alarm when you're off track or going the wrong direction. Displays a simple graphic representation of your route and also creates an elevation profile of your route in graph format. Included speed and cadence sensors offer an accurate measurement of your performance; also compatable with all ANT+ power meters (not included). Track your heart rate with the included heart rate transmitter to maximize your training. Heart rate programming includes four intensity zones and displays how much time you spend in each zone. Use the pre-programmed Fitness or Fat Burning Zone or easily create your own; an audible and visual zone alarm will help keep you in your target zone. Lap counter records speed, cadence and heart rate values for each lap up to 99 laps. The trip data is automatically recorded in the LOG and can be optionally downloaded to the SIGMA DATA CENTER 3 evaluation software; up to 25 hrs. can be recorded in the LOG. DATA CENTER 3 software makes ride data simple to download, track and analyze; the start page features a concise summary for quick analysis. The SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 wireless GPS bike computer set includes GPS computer, speed sensor, cadence sensor, heart-rate transmitter, mounting bracket, spoke and cadence magnet. Also includes a USB cable and wall charger.
